General.Name: Essensys PLC
General.Description: essensys plc operates as a software and technology company in the United Kingdom and the United States of America. The company operates a software and technology platform that connects, controls, and automates digital services, as well as manages the critical infrastructure and business processes. It serves multi-site flexible workspace providers, commercial real estate providers, and multi-site landlords. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Aldgate Tower, London, United Kingdom, E1 8FA
